mapper.sql: id , post_id, member_id, content, create_date, report
mapper.select: SELECT c.content, to_char(c.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') create_date, c.report, m.id, m.name FROM comments c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postid}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, co.* FROM (SELECT c.content, to_char(c.create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') create_date, c.report, m.id, m.name FROM comments c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.post_id = #{num} ORDER BY id asc) co) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
